title: ‘Cycling Is a Freeing Tool’: How Celebrity Chef Chris Cosentino Manages His Mental Health through Biking
content:
From his culinary career to family life, riding a bike helps Chris Cosentino keep it all together. 

Read the full article at ‘Cycling Is a Freeing Tool’: How Celebrity Chef Chris Cosentino Manages His Mental Health through Biking on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
